title: Chicken Alfredo
instructions: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
In a pan, melt butter and sauté garlic.
Add chicken and cook until done.
Pour in heavy cream and simmer.
Stir in Parmesan cheese until melted.
Combine pasta with sauce and serve.

title: Vegetarian Tacos
instructions: Warm tortillas in a pan.
Layer black beans, avocado, tomato, lettuce, and cheese on tortillas.
Top with salsa and serve.

title: Grilled Salmon
instructions: Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
Brush salmon with olive oil and season with garlic and dill.
Grill salmon for 4-6 minutes per side.
Serve with lemon wedges.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
instructions: Heat sesame oil in a pan.
Add garlic and ginger, sauté until fragrant.
Add vegetables and stir fry until tender.
Pour in soy sauce and cook for another minute.
Serve hot.

title: Margherita Pizza
instructions: Preheat oven to 475°F (245°C).
Spread tomato sauce over pizza dough.
Top with mozzarella cheese and fresh basil.
Drizzle with olive oil.
Bake for 10-15 minutes until crust is golden.
Serve hot.

title: Chicken Curry
instructions: Sauté onion, garlic, and ginger in a pot.
Add chicken and cook until browned.
Stir in curry powder and cook for another minute.
Add tomatoes and coconut milk, simmer until chicken is cooked through.
Serve with rice.

title: Quinoa Salad
instructions: Cook quinoa according to package instructions.
Mix quinoa with diced cucumber, tomato, red onion, and feta cheese.
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice.
Serve chilled.

title: Shrimp Scampi
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
In a pan, melt butter and sauté garlic.
Add shrimp and cook until pink.
Stir in lemon juice and parsley.
Combine with cooked spaghetti and serve.

title: Lentil Soup
instructions: Sauté onion, carrot, celery, and garlic in a pot.
Add lentils, tomato paste, and cumin.
Pour in water or broth and bring to a boil.
Simmer until lentils are tender.
Serve hot.

title: Caprese Salad
instructions: Slice tomato and mozzarella cheese.
Layer tomato, mozzarella, and basil on a plate.
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar.
Serve chilled.

title: Falafel
instructions: Blend chickpeas, onion, garlic, parsley, cumin, and coriander in a food processor.
Form mixture into balls and flatten slightly.
Heat oil in a pan and fry falafel until golden brown.
Serve with pita bread and tahini sauce.

title: Chicken Caesar Salad
instructions: Grill or sauté chicken breast and slice.
Toss romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing.
Top with chicken, croutons, and Parmesan cheese.
Serve chilled.

title: Pad Thai
instructions: Cook rice noodles according to package instructions.
In a pan, cook shrimp until pink.
Push shrimp to the side and scramble egg in the same pan.
Add cooked noodles, bean sprouts, and soy sauce.
Stir to combine and top with peanuts and lime.

title: Vegetable Samosas
instructions: Boil and mash potatoes.
Sauté onion, garlic, ginger, and cumin in a pan.
Add peas and mashed potatoes, cook for a few minutes.
Prepare dough with flour and water, roll into circles.
Fill with potato mixture, fold, and seal edges.
Fry samosas in hot oil until golden brown.
Serve hot.

title: Tofu Stir Fry
instructions: Heat sesame oil in a pan.
Add garlic and ginger, sauté until fragrant.
Add tofu and cook until golden brown.
Add vegetables and stir fry until tender.
Pour in soy sauce and cook for another minute.
Serve hot.

title: Vegetarian Chili
instructions: Sauté onion, bell pepper, and garlic in a pot.
Add beans, tomatoes, and chili powder.
Simmer for 20-30 minutes.
Serve hot.

title: Chicken Fried Rice
instructions: Cook rice according to package instructions.
In a pan, scramble egg and set aside.
Sauté chicken until cooked through, add carrot and peas.
Add rice and soy sauce, stir to combine.
Stir in scrambled egg and green onions.
Serve hot.

title: Greek Salad
instructions: Dice cucumber, tomato, and red onion.
Mix with olives and feta cheese.
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice.
Serve chilled.

title: Fish Tacos
instructions: Cook fish fillets until done.
Warm tortillas in a pan.
Layer fish, cabbage, avocado, and cilantro on tortillas.
Top with sour cream and a squeeze of lime.
Serve immediately.

title: Mushroom Risotto
instructions: Sauté onion and garlic in a pot.
Add mushrooms and cook until tender.
Stir in Arborio rice and cook for a minute.
Add white wine and cook until absorbed.
Gradually add vegetable broth, stirring frequently.
Cook until rice is creamy and tender.
Stir in Parmesan cheese and serve.

title: Chicken Quesadillas
instructions: Cook chicken breast and slice thinly.
Sauté bell pepper and onion until tender.
Place chicken, bell pepper, onion, and cheese on one half of a tortilla.
Fold tortilla and cook in a pan until golden brown.
Serve with sour cream and salsa.

title: Eggplant Parmesan
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Slice eggplant and coat with bread crumbs.
Bake eggplant slices until tender.
Layer eggplant, tomato sauce, and cheeses in a baking dish.
Bake for 25-30 minutes until cheese is melted.
Garnish with basil and serve.

title: Vegetarian Lasagna
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Cook lasagna noodles according to package instructions.
Mix ricotta cheese with spinach.
Layer noodles, ricotta mixture, tomato sauce, and mozzarella cheese in a baking dish.
Repeat layers and top with Parmesan cheese.
Bake for 30-35 minutes until cheese is melted.
Serve hot.

title: Chickpea Curry
instructions: Sauté onion, garlic, and ginger in a pot.
Add chickpeas and cook for a few minutes.
Stir in curry powder and cook for another minute.
Add tomatoes and coconut milk, simmer until chickpeas are tender.
Serve with rice.

title: Shrimp Fried Rice
instructions: Cook rice according to package instructions.
In a pan, scramble egg and set aside.
Sauté shrimp until pink, add carrot and peas.
Add rice and soy sauce, stir to combine.
Stir in scrambled egg and green onions.
Serve hot.

title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Cook quinoa according to package instructions.
Mix quinoa with black beans, corn, and diced tomato.
Cut tops off bell peppers and remove seeds.
Stuff peppers with quinoa mixture and top with cheese.
Bake for 25-30 minutes until peppers are tender.
Serve hot.

title: Vegetarian Sushi Rolls
instructions: Cook sushi rice according to package instructions.
Place a sheet of nori on a bamboo mat.
Spread a layer of sushi rice on nori.
Add strips of cucumber, carrot, and avocado.
Roll tightly and slice into pieces.
Serve with soy sauce.

title: Chickpea Salad
instructions: Mix chickpeas with diced cucumber, tomato, and red onion.
Add crumbled feta cheese.
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice.
Serve chilled.

title: Chicken Fajitas
instructions: Slice chicken breast, bell pepper, and onion.
Sauté chicken and vegetables until cooked through.
Warm tortillas in a pan.
Fill tortillas with chicken and vegetables.
Serve with sour cream and salsa.

title: Spinach and Ricotta Stuffed Shells
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Cook pasta shells according to package instructions.
Mix ricotta cheese with spinach and Parmesan cheese.
Stuff shells with ricotta mixture.
Place in a baking dish and cover with tomato sauce.
Bake for 25-30 minutes until heated through.
Serve hot.
